name: Dr. Elsa B. Góngora Castillo
institution: Department of Marine Resources, Cinvestav Mérida
bio: My research focuses on plant-pathogen interaction, defense systems, and genetic regulation, using high-throughput sequencing and bioinformatics to analyze genomes, transcriptomes, and metagenomes.

education.text: Biochemical Engineer from the Technological Institute of Mérida. Yucatán, México.
Ph.D. in Sciences with a specialization in Plant Biotechnology from Cinvestav Irapuato. Guanajuato, México.
Associate Professor at Michigan State University
Associate Researcher at North Carolina State University.
Mexico-CONAHCYT Researcher at Scientific Research Center of Yucatán (CICY).
